sentences.reference: Professor: How has remote work affected traditional offices?
sentences.fullSentence: It has significantly changed the traditional office model

sentences.reference: Classmate: What are governments doing to cut carbon emissions?
sentences.fullSentence: They are implementing new policies to reduce carbon emissions

sentences.reference: Student: Preschool is not very important for development.
sentences.fullSentence: Early childhood education plays a critical role in cognitive development

sentences.reference: Professor: Why was the conclusion surprising?
sentences.fullSentence: It showed that the method that we used was flawed

sentences.reference: Teammate: Good leaders can just improvise without planning.
sentences.fullSentence: Effective leadership requires careful planning and decision-making

sentences.reference: Lecturer: How does climate change affect farming?
sentences.fullSentence: It threatens the agricultural sector in many regions

sentences.reference: Professor: Which skill is most important for success in modern education?
sentences.fullSentence: Critical thinking is essential for success in modern education

sentences.reference: Student: The ocean floor stays the same over time.
sentences.fullSentence: Tectonic plates shape the movement of the ocean floor

sentences.reference: Classmate: Is artificial intelligence only eliminating jobs?
sentences.fullSentence: It is creating new job opportunities while eliminating others

sentences.reference: Friend: Learning another language is just memorizing grammar.
sentences.fullSentence: Learning a second language provides a strong foundation for understanding other cultures
